This JO is the kanji for 'castle' is it not??  Hence Tom's reference to Tsuru(ga) Jo - 'Crane Castle' - actually White Crane Castle http://www.flickr.com/photos/queenscents/2662335097/

Probably a coincidence???

Regards,
Barry Thomas.


  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Richard Turner 
  To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, July 25, 2009 10:55 AM
  Subject: Re: [nihontostudy] help with kanji...


    Tsuru could also be Kaku ?? There are several using this kanji in the 
  Haynes index.

  Tom are you referring to Tsurujo, the female tosu-shi ?

  Cheers

  Rich
